title: Bad Mommy Moments
description: Are you an overwhelmed, guilt-ridden mom? Are you secretly counting down the hours until bedtime? Are you completely ignoring your child to read the back of this book? Don't worry--you're not alone. ''Bad Mommy Moments'' is a mixed-media trip through the days of new motherhood that suck. Because it's often after our worst moments that we realize how lucky we are.
author: Cindy Kane
